Bud Abbott and Lou Costello Meet the Invisible Man

Ano: 1951

IMDb ID: tt0043255

Classificação: 6.6

Sinopse: Boxer Tommy Nelson is accused of killing his manager. While detectives Bud and Lou investigate, they come across an invisibility formula with which Tommy injects himself rather than face the police. This sparks an idea for trapping gangster Morgan by having Lou fight champ Rocky Hanlon, with Tommy's invisible help.—Ed Stephan
